DOC.brief_title: Ph II Bev + Either Temozolomide/Etoposide GBM Pts Who Have Failed Bev + Irinotecan
DOC.detailed_description: This exploratory , two-arm , phase II study design assess anti-tumor activity bev + either daily temozolomide/etoposide among GBM pt w progressive disease follow bev + irinotecan . About 48 participant w recurrent GBM take part study . Approximately 24 participant receive bev plus temozolomide & approximately 24 receive bev + etoposide . Pts must confirm diagnosis GBM & radiographic evidence recurrence follow prior therapy bev + irinotecan . 24 pt enrol onto arm single-stage study . If 4 24 pt live 6/more month without disease progression , treatment regimen consider worthy investigation . Otherwise , treatment regimen determine worthy investigation within pt population . Type I & II error rate associate w test 0.030 & 0.115 respectively . Management guideline dose reduction/interruption temo , etoposide , & bev .
